articles.title: Greetings to President of Guyana
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Guyana
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to David Arthur Granger, president of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana, on Feb. 8 on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of its proclamation.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the desire of their peoples and wished the president greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Russian Day of Defenders of Motherland Observed
articles.content:
Russian Day of Defenders of Motherland Observed
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora and Military Attache Alexei Bartusov of the Russian embassy here gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Wednesday to mark the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Sun Nam, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.

articles.title: 32nd Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University Opens
articles.content:
32nd Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University Opens
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The 32nd Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University was opened with due ceremony on Wednesday.
					 Presented to the festival, attended by teachers, researchers and graduate students and students of the university, are over 280 scientific research achievements helpful to the improvement of the people's standard of living and the building of an economic power.
					
					 The festival, divided into nine panels including math and physics, elements and devices, agriculture and bio-engineering and medicine, will involve presentation and exhibition of sci-tech successes, exhibition contest among different units and exchange of new technologies.

articles.title: Sci-tech Achievements Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Sci-tech Achievements Made in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Central Measuring Science Institute under the State Commission of Quality Management in the DPRK has recently made series of achievements in its research into modernizing checking-instruments, standard weighing-instruments and measuring-gauges for industrial use.
					 The institute upgraded photocolorimeter for public health and foodstuff industry sectors and remade old analog colorimeters into digital ones with improved efficiency.
					
					 It also succeeded in manufacturing moisture meters for 9 kinds of grains on the level of international standard and developed an instrument to check gas-alarm and established a system based on it, thus providing a sci-tech guarantee to the prevention of accidents caused by harmful gases in collieries and mines.
					
					 And it has completed many other checking-instruments and gauges to be conducive to building an economic giant and improving the people's living standard.

articles.title: February 25 Prize Bowling Tournament Held
articles.content:
February 25 Prize Bowling Tournament Held
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Bowling Tournament for February 25 Prize took place at the Pyongyang Gold Lane on Feb. 21-22.
					 Bowling fans from all walks of life took part in the tournament, which was held on the occasion of the anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to the newly-built gold lane.
					
					 Its participants, divided into men's and women's individual and doubles and team (three men, one woman) events, competed on a knockout basis.
					
					 They fully demonstrated their technique.

articles.title: Construction of Ryomyong Street Verging on Completion
articles.content:
Construction of Ryomyong Street Verging on Completion
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The construction of Ryomyong Street makes headway at the final stage in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The interior works of apartment buildings reached 99 percent.
					
					 Builders are overfulfilling the daily plan, while paying primary attention to ensuring the quality of construction.

articles.title: Great Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung in Building People's Power
articles.content:
Great Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung in Building People's Power
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- It has been 70 years since the People's Committee of North Korea was established under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					 From the early years of his revolutionary activities, Kim Il Sung had regarded the issue of power as the fundamentals of the revolution and set forth the policy of building the people's power in consonance with the realities of guerilla zones and specific conditions of anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 In accordance with the policy, the people's revolutionary government, the first of its kind in the history of the working class for power-building, was established at all the guerrilla zones in the area along the River Tuman.
					
					 On August 20, Juche 34 (1945), just five days after the country's liberation, he made public "Founding the Party, State and Armed Forces in the Liberated Homeland" and other famous works to indicate that the main orientation and goal in solving the issue of power is to build the democratic people's republic.
					
					 The President saw to it that the popular masses set up local people's committees at all levels by their own efforts after abolishing the Japanese imperialists' colonial ruling mechanism and were equipped themselves with the line of nation building to lay a social foundation for building the power.
					
					 On this basis, he established the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea and developed it into the People's Committee of North Korea through a democratic election in February 1947 after successfully carrying out the tasks of the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution like agrarian reform and nationalization of major industries.
					
					 In September 1948, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a unified government of Korea, was founded.

articles.title: Seminar of Korean Social Scientists in Japan
articles.content:
Seminar of Korean Social Scientists in Japan
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Korean social scientists in Japan held a seminar at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 18 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Kim Song Hun, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Chairman Ri Yong Su and members of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, leading officials of Chongryon organizations and enterprises, teachers and students of Korean University and Chongryon officials and compatriots in Kanto.
					
					 At the seminar, speakers noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea called for holding fast to the general line of socialist construction and the self-development-first spirit as the eternal strategic line and set the building of a sci-tech power as an important target to be hit on a priority basis in building a socialist power.
					
					 They explained the successes registered by the DPRK last year in the 70-day campaign for greeting the 7th WPK Congress with labor achievements and the 200-day campaign for making a breakthrough in the implementation of the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 They stressed that the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address would be successfully carried out in line with the above-said strategy.
					
					 They noted that last year the DPRK's strategic position and influence underwent signal enhancement and the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group faced shameful failure in their anachronistic "strategic patience" policy and anti-DPRK racket.
					
					 They said that the DPRK would further enhance its international influence and develop the external relations on its own initiative and in a diverse way.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Has to Write Confession First: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Has to Write Confession First: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is mulling working out a white paper dealing with what the Park Geun Hye regime has "gained" in its four years' office ending June only to provoke laughter of the world people.
					 The white paper whose drafting is to be manipulated by Chongwadae will reportedly cite "achievements" made by the regime in the past four years in different fields of the "state administration" such as "economic prosperity", "creative economy", "cultural prosperity", "people's happiness", and "peaceful unification".
					
					 Traitor Park is keen on publishing the above-said white paper, though she is fated to go to jail for hideous scandals. This action mocking at the public only makes even a cat laugh.
					
					 Park's four years' office is woven with manifold crimes.
					
					 What she has done while in office is nothing but acts of making economy go bankrupt, deteriorating the people's living, bringing the north-south ties to a total collapse through sycophancy and treachery and escalated confrontation with the fellow countrymen and reducing south Korea to a complete colony of the U.S.
					
					 Such deeds have touched off candlelight actions of angry people, an eruption of their pent-up wrath and indignation against the puppet group which resorted to fascist dictatorship, anti-social policies, sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The infuriated candlelight holders from all walks of life are demanding that the Chongwadae dragon lady, a top-class trouble-maker of the nation, be ousted from power and sent to prison as quickly as possible.
					
					 Yet, Park and her yes-men had the face to stage the above-said farce, a clear indication of their impudence and shamelessness.
					
					 South Koreans now blame the puppet group, querying if they have their normal senses and asking if the present situation allows them to do such a thing, though publishing the white paper is an annual occurrence. This is by no means accidental.
					
					 Judging from the fact that even the coteries of the "Parun Party", a breakaway from the Park Geun Hye group, jeered at the puppet group, admonishing them to write repentance white paper, before writing "publicity white paper", the puppet group seems to have gone out of their right senses.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the group. They seek to conceal their thrice-cursed crimes, justify sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with the compatriots in the north and anti-social rule in an effort to calm down the angry public and evade punishment by history.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, matchless bete noire and the worst criminal, has to write a confession paper before resorting to chicanery.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish calculation than thinking she can prolong her remaining days by embellishing her crimes.
					
					 Crimes bring punishment.
					
					 The broad segments of the south Koreans should deal a sledge-hammer blow of justice at Park Geun Hye bereft of even elementary face and discerning ability as a human being.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Charade to Cover up Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Charade to Cover up Past Crimes
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Japan staged such cheap publicity stunt as presenting "bell for peace and justice" to the International Criminal Court allegedly in congratulation of the completion of its new building in 2015.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary terms the Japanese ruling forces' impudent action a foolish daydream of covering up their past crimes and disguising themselves as an "apostle of peace".
					
					 Accusing Japan of running the whole gamut of sleight of hand to cover up the past woven with monstrous crimes, the commentary says:
					
					 Chief Cabinet Secretary of Japan Suga in a recent interview with CNN of the U.S. spouted out rigmaroles as regards the sexual slavery that "no evidence proving the forcible drafting by the army or by police has been found from among the materials discovered by the government so far".
					
					 Moreover, Japan is taking much pain to have the statues of girl sexual slave in different places pulled down.
					
					 Enraged by the erection of a girl statue before the Japanese consulate general in Pusan of south Korea, Japan made much fuss, recalling its ambassador and consul general home.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are making such desperate bid to deny and cover up their crimes by staging the above-said farce even at a time when undeniable material evidence is being brought to light as the days go by. They are no more than snobs who contend money is everything.
					
					 The world will never be taken in by Japan's advocacy of "peace and justice" on the international arena, a schme to hide its past crimes and embellish its on-going moves for reinvasion.

articles.title: More Truth behind Park's Abuse of Power Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Truth behind Park's Abuse of Power Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that Park Geun Hye talked Choe Sun Sil over the phone more than two or three times a day by use of a mobile phone in other subscriber's name. 
					 For six months of last year, Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil had more than 570 phone contacts.
					
					 After Choe fled to Germany, they talked on the phone 127 times.
					
					 On Nov. 4 last year when Park was about to publish "talk to the people", they talked on the phone until late at night.
					
					 The use of mobile phone in other person's name is a new clue proving Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal and is a key proof that can have no small impact on impeachment trial to be staged by "constitutional court", CBS of south Korea said.

articles.title: S. Korea: Park Urged to Face Investigation by "Constitutional Court"
articles.content:
S. Korea: Park Urged to Face Investigation by "Constitutional Court"
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- An editorial of south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Tuesday urged traitor Park Geun Hye to face trial by "constitutional court".
					 Park refuses to appear at "constitutional court", the editorial said, expressing repugnance at Park being considerate of only face-saving and practicing privilege even though her duties are suspended. 
					
					 Park thinks that if she builds up public opinion and delays trial, she can survive, but she is miscalculating, it pointed out, adding:
					
					 It is shame for Park to insist on privilege even after she left "state administration" to Choe Sun Sil without any official post.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Events such as meeting, seminar, Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition and film show were held at different units of Russia between January 27 and February 8 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the exhibition were photos showing the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the Korean army and people in the struggle to usher in a golden age of building a socialist power.
					
					 Such Korean films as "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt Paektu" were shown.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of different social strata and masses.
					
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding brilliant commander, a genuine patriot and a great guardian of justice and peace.
					
					 Dolgachev, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said that Kim Jong Il visited Russia several times for the strengthening of the Russia-DPRK friendship, adding that the Russian people are cherishing the precious memories of him.
					
					 Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that he heard from preceding generations a lot about President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and about socialist Korea, the most genuine paradise for the people on the planet, and in the course came to ardently admire them.
					
					 Elena Bavichi, chairwoman of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, said that she would constantly keep the reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Andrei Dmitriyev, chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, said that he would bear in mind the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and widely disseminate their works.
					
					 Khmelyov, first secretary of the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is member of the Legislative Assembly of Maritime Territory, and other personages said they looked back with deep emotion upon the undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 4 to mark the 5th anniversary of the awarding of the title of DPRK Generalissimo to leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Five years ago the Korean people awarded the title of DPRK Generalissimo to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is a legendary brilliant commander of Mt Paektu as he had smashed the U.S. imperialists and their followers' moves for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 With his Songun politics, he turned the DPRK into an impregnable fortress and made it demonstrate its might as a space power and a nuclear weapons state and defended peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He also made immortal contributions to the cause of national reunification.
					
					 All the successes registered in the DPRK are attributable to the Songun politics pursued by him.
					
					 We extend eternal glory to Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Songun brilliant commander of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Germany and Nigeria issued statements on February 9 and 13 to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said in its statement:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and turned the DPRK into a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and a space power.
					
					 The DPRK is shedding its rays as the beacon of hope for the progressive mankind.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who fully inherited President Kim Il Sung's idea of national reunification, made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted to provide a historic milestone for accomplishing the cause of reunification.
					
					 The Korean people and the world revolutionary people are splendidly celebrating his 75th birth anniversary as a common holiday of humankind, boundlessly revering him.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association in its statement said that the progressive mankind are praising the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of world independence.
					
					 Through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities, Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung, into the guiding idea of the DPRK and the great idea showing the road ahead of the independence era, it said, adding:
					
					 He strengthened the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force and turned the DPRK into a dignified socialist fortress and the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 His lifelong exploits will shine forever as the most precious heritage guaranteeing the victorious advance of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Azzawi Media Print Publishing House in Berlin brought out in pamphlet "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious", a work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, on February 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a history of victory in which the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il have been displayed.
					
					 And it stresses that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be invincible.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Guyana
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Guyana
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 8 un mensaje de felicitacion a David Arthur Granger, presidente de la Republica Cooperativa de Guyana, en ocasion del 47o aniversario de la promulgacion de ese pais.
					En su misiva, el remitente manifesto su conviccion de que se intensificaran y se desarrollaran aun mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Guyana, de acuerdo con la aspiracion de los pueblos de dos paises y formulo votos por mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario.

articles.title: Llegan a 99% las obras internas de viviendas de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Llegan a 99% las obras internas de viviendas de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- La construccion de la avenida Ryomyong de Corea esta en etapa crucial, sobre todo, llegaron al 99% los resultados de las obras internas de las viviendas.
					Tras terminar la instalacion de herrajes, los constructores concentran las fuerzas en los trabajos que exigen la elevada calificacion tecnica.
					
					En la pintura interna ellos observan estrictamente las demandas de las reglas y metodos de construccion y cumplen ciertamente el plan diario prestando atencion primordial a la calidad.
					
					En medio del fervor de la emulacion colectiva, se registran cada dia buenos resultados en el campo de construccion.

articles.title: ACNC critica intento de publicar carta blanca sobre "meritos" de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC critica intento de publicar carta blanca sobre "meritos" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ahora, los titeres surcoreanos intentan publicar hasta finales de junio que viene la carta blanca sobre los "meritos" del "gobierno" de Park Geun-hye realizados durante 4 anos de su mandato, lo cual provoca risas burlonas de todo el mundo. 
					La edicion protagonizada por Chongwadae recogera los "exitos" alcanzados en ese periodo segun las tareas politicas presentadas por Park Geun-hye como "rehabilitacion economica", "economia creativa", "prosperidad cultural", "felicidad del pueblo" y "paz y unificacion". 
					
					Lejos de "meritos", en el cuatrienio de su mandato, la traidora Park cometio multiples crimenes que merecen la pena de prision. 
					
					Lo que hizo ella fue haber llevado a la ruptura la economia, la vida de la poblacion y las relaciones intercoreanas y convertido el suelo surcoreano en colonia completa de EE.UU. recurriendo al servilismo a grandes potencias y al enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Como resultado, se ha desatado la lucha de todo el pueblo con velas en sus manos. 
					
					Esto significo la explosion de rencor y colera arraigados contra la banda titere surcoreana, acostumbrada a la dictadura fascista, las politicas antipopulares, el servilismo a grandes potencias y el enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Hoy dia, los habitantes surcoreanos levantados en la lucha con velas demandan fuertemente destituir y encarcelar lo mas pronto posible a la diabla de Chongwadae. 
					
					En cuanto al cinico intento de publicar la susodicha carta blanca, suenan fuertes voces de condena en distintos sectores de la sociedad surcoreanas.
					
					Hasta los miembros del "Partido Parun", agrupacion separada del partido de Park Geun-hye, exigen a esta y sus compinches que escriban primero las reflexiones de sus errores.
					
					La camarilla de Park quiere publicar la polemica carta blanca con el siniestro intento de calmar a la poblacion indignada y eludir la sentencia de la historia justificando sus crimenes inauditos, actos vendepatrias y fratricidas y politicas antipopulares.
					
					Esa escoria humana y criminal de peor calana debera escribir primero la nota de confesion de sus delitos.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores castigaran duro a esa mujerzuela que dejo de ser humana hace mucho tiempo.
